message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $8,500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $9,000. I know it's worth that much to you, and I'm confident you'll get great value from it.
